text:
The “Essentials” page on the docs (<https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/base/base/>)
has so many nonEssential things.
It even explicitly has a subsection called “internals”.

Fine, I will open an issue
<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/39188>

Let’s burn the bridges one at a time.

text: There’s a good Spanish saying about that, taking one’s time and not getting worn out, so that you are able to actually complete the task.

elements.text: There’s a good Spanish saying about that, taking one’s time and not getting worn out, so that you are able to actually complete the task.

text: What is it? I can think of “El que mucho abarca, poco aprieta” but that one may or may not exist in spain.
